scripts.compile: yarn tsc && yarn copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.graphql dist
scripts.dev: export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS=$HOME/.config/gcloud/application_default_credentials.json && export GCLOUD_PROJECT=dasher-253813 && yarn nodemon --delay 0.5 -e ts  --exec "yarn compile || exit 1 && yarn start "
scripts.deploy:batcher: yarn deploy && gcloud functions deploy uptime_batcher --runtime=nodejs10 --trigger-http --region=europe-west1 --timeout=60 --project=dasher-253813
scripts.deploy:poller: yarn deploy && gcloud functions deploy uptime_poller --runtime nodejs10 --trigger-topic uptime-urls-to-poll --region=europe-west1 --timeout=60 --project=dasher-253813
